author: CBR
description:
Ryan Coogler talks about a possible Sinners comic, revealing his love of American comic books and graphic novels, and how storyboard artists keep asking if there’s a comic version of the film.

🎙️ Clip from CBR’s Heroes Journey Podcast – Episode 7.

- Watch the full episode here: https://youtu.be/WeUD61KLmzw
- More Heroes Journey Podcast episodes: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLfpipp6KbWs4apsUf5fIcxVw1cpaXXWxg

#Sinners #RyanCoogler #Comics #GraphicNovel #MichaelBJordan #CBR #HeroesJourney #Podcast #Interview

title: Could SINNERS Go to Comics? Ryan Coogler Has An Exciting Answer! #Sinners #Comics #CBR
